text:
I run Ardent Growth as CEO along with Cody West as COO. 

Our specialty is content and business development strategy. People come to us when they want financial projections, topic clustering models at scale, content and gap audits, competitive link analysis, and when they want to learn to do business development in a way that supports marketing and PR. 

Since we're primarily focused on strategy, we're always looking for people to partner with on projects! If anyone specializes in any one particular segment of content, design, copywriting, advertising, production, _et cetera_, I'd love to connect. :wave:
